comments:
Use the same sample attached to bug https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=185237

Select SMLVersion folder and Export to SMLIF ; keep defaults. Press finish or try to move to the next page, nothing happens

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 2007-05-02 17:49:49.495
!MESSAGE Unhandled event loop exception
!STACK 0

	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:615)

I went ahead and fixed this one, as it was an easy fix, and doing so helps us in diagnosing other problems.  The problem scenario was doing an export that did not follow an import, i.e. when the metadata file did not exist.  In this case there was no metadata file handler, and our initialization of page 2, which expected there to be a handler, was failing with an NPE.
